docs.title: Opservatory
docs.text: A small deployable tool for opserving local fleet of machines and reserving them for staging/testing.

docs.title: Deploy
docs.text:
Use this docker compose to deploy the system:

version: "3.3"

services:
  opservatory:
    image: <put an actual deckerhub image here>
    ports:
     - "80:5000"
    volumes:
      - ./volumes:/app/opservatory/volumes

docker-compose up --build -d
